title_advert: ['Come home to a lush green landscape Environment']
descriptions:
['DescriptionCome home to a lush green landscape Environment 
Enveloped by the -18 hole Championship golf course and just minutes from lush Dubai Hills Park, EMERALD HILLS is Dubai Hills Estate’s most prestigious neighbourhood — the perfect choice for those looking to build their dream home in a sensational setting.
AT EMERALD HILLS, YOU ARE IN GOOD COMPANY
Come home to a lush green landscape dotted with some of Dubai’s most prestigious villas. Where your neighbours also have a penchant for the finer things in life and Downtown Dubai and the beach are just 15-20 minutes away.
YOUR GREATEST ROUND OF GOLF, ONLY MOMENTS FROM YOUR DOORSTEP
Enjoy 1,2 millions sqm of meticulously manicured fairways (the size of 63 football fields). Set against the backdrop of Burj Khalifa and Downtown Dubai, with a glorious outward nine, the 18-hole Championship golf course is bound to inspire your peak performance.']

title_advert: ['Upgraded Bungalow in Green Community West']
amenities:
['Unfurnished
Built in Wardrobes
Covered Parking
Kitchen Appliances
Maids Room
Shared Gym']
descriptions: ["DescriptionLuxhabitat is proud to introduce this upgraded Bungalow for sale in Green Community West with a built up area of 4,300 sq ft. The property has 4 large en-suite bedrooms, guest bathroom, spacious large living room, formal dining room and a large open-plan upgraded kitchen with a breakfast area. The flooring throughout the property has been upgraded. It has a maid's room and a separate laundry room just outside the property. The plot size is over 10,000 sq ft. Its in a very nice private location close to the main gate of Green Community West. It's in a perfect condition and rented until June 2020. The garden is very big and has a shaded seating area. This property has a double door garage for 2 cars and an entrance that can fit up to 6 cars. \nGreen Community is one of Dubai's most exclusive lifestyle communities with an environmentally conscious infrastructure that complements the community's lush surroundings. Cobbled roads, pedestrian walkways, bicycle paths, and low speed limits ensure the residential areas are relatively traffic-free.  24-hour security enables residents and families to feel safe and secure. Green Community is widely considered to be one of the most beautiful communities in Dubai for family living - it has two large parks, a lake, numerous community swimming pools, gymnasiums, tennis courts, basketball courts, a volleyball court and plenty of children's play areas. Green Community also hosts an onsite shopping mall, schools, hospital and a Marriott Courtyard hotel."]
